name: Junior Python Developer
description:
Inca Digital is looking for a Junior Python Developer to contribute to our event-driven financial data pipelines. We are happy to hire someone with minimal experience, but willing to learn the latest tools. This can be a part-time or a full-time position with a flexible schedule and the possibility to assume more responsibilities.

Duties:

Writing Python functions for event-driven pipelines
Handling MongoDB collections
Test and deployment automation

Requirements:

- Familiarity with Python and relevant libraries
- Experience with MongoDB indexes and query optimization
- Cloud infrastructure basics (AWS Lambda, GitHub Actions, MongoDB Atlas, Confluent Cloud)

General Requirements:

- Fluent English. We are an international team and most of the business is conducted in English.
- Independence. There will be no marching orders. You are expected to organize your day, get the work done, and speak up when there's a problem.
- High level of professional ethics and attention to detail. You'll be treating sensitive information on a daily basis. We need you to handle it with care.
- Willingness to learn. We can teach you everything and don't have any strict experience requirements, but you must be willing to learn new tools every day.

Selection, Hiring, and Onboarding process:

- One of our team members will reach out to set up a 30-minute Google Meet call with selected candidates.
- On your first day, you will be assigned a number of training issues to complete during your onboarding period and a dedicated onboarding buddy who will help you close them and answer any questions along the way.
- At the end of the 3-month period, we will evaluate the results of your milestone together with you and negotiate a long-term contract.
Conditions
- To help your profile stand out, please consider solving one of our Python challenges - github.com/1712n/challenge/issues/86
- Make sure you familiarize yourself with our handbook, a short guide describing our values, business processes, and tools - hygge.work

Conditions:

- You'll be a part of a small team of computer engineers, security experts, scientists, mathematicians, and finance experts.
- You will be hired as a contractor with a choice of how and when you want to get paid. We are open to students and part-time candidates!
- We have a clear and open business process on GitHub. You'll see the result of your work with zero red tape slowing things down.
- We don't look over each other's shoulders and expect you to take the initiative, find things to do, and get them done.
- We don't discriminate based on race, nationality, age, sex, sexual orientation, physical abilities, or political views. We expect the same from you.

About the company: Inca Digital is an open-source intelligence company building analytics tools. We began our journey in 2009, when our founders met working at INTERPOL. They started a friendship that grew into a mutual passion for disruptive technology. Inca now boasts a team of some of the best engineers, analysts, and security experts, all striving to make intelligence accessible.
